DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates if the German Version of the NDI is sensitive to change over time.
DOC.brief_title: Responsiveness of the German Version of the Neck Disability Index (NDI-G)
DOC.detailed_description: Chronic neck pain patients will be asked to participate in the study. The participants are asked to fill out the NDI at the beginning of the study and after seven weeks. Additionally the participants will fill out the PGIC.
DOC.criteria: Chronic neck pain over 18 years old informed consent able to speak, write and read German. Any problems that may exclude Manual Therapy treatment of the cervical spine e.g fractures
